39b343a32a4f1ce18ee98a34618fda0a5404d6a0.commitMessage: Issue #3143: forbid empty return statements and fixed violations

9777146e28e6457160a7f91d897776f9fe4af10a.commitMessage: Issue #2428: remove dependency to commons-lang3 library

167dd96d8ca503a472bf003f187191d6b0ce586c.commitMessage: Issue #2428: remove dependency to commons-lang3 library

77733a452387aa2ee99fdc9a737633566cc7af3d.commitMessage: Issue #2836: renamed error message fields to match standard naming

c4cac1d520d41f35a5c4405a7efd2b94be8b945b.commitMessage: Issue #2451: removed excess hierarchy from OperatorWrapCheck

46a52f84c014e4d25379f429f11ed3de11fe8ae7.commitMessage:
Issue #1555: Rename methods returning boolean to use question word

Fixes some `BooleanMethodNameMustStartWithQuestion` inspection violations.

Description:
>Reports boolean methods whose names do not start with a question word. Boolean methods that override library methods are ignored by this inspection.

cdf3e56bacd3895262af8a1df9ca5c81f4071970.commitMessage: Utils class has been splitted to CommonUtils and TokenUtils. Issue #1898

1c42e3eeb9aeebc47b2373541c1cc8d311d8b671.commitMessage: Fix PMD violations from 'strings' ruleset, issue #873

1bd30555eac039d0486dffb3fc43b7a34117909b.commitMessage:
Remove useless parentheses to fix PMD violations, issue #744

Parentheses are considered unnecessary if the evaluation order of an expression remains unchanged if the parentheses are removed.

d4b933799af120cf4a8490db98f396b6348430e9.commitMessage: Overhaul of how AbstractOptionCheck works. It now requires that the option type is a Java 5 Enum and hence the AbstractOption class has been removed.

35d1673788bbbac8263fdb69275dc6a63b095a24.commitMessage: Making local variables final where possible.

865ba5284aace7651f93dc81b0c196d1316a9fdd.commitMessage:
Changes for grammer to keep as much text in AST tree as we can.
For now I do nothing with this/super in (SUPER_)CTOR_CALL.
Should think more about this.

Also I've changed grammer to not generate extends/implement cleases
if there is no such in the code.

Made some refactoring for build.xml to make possible to redirect build
output to custom directory (and we used too much hardcoded paths there
:)

It looks like this is my last commit before vacation, so I hope
I will break nothing :)

2a9fd54faa88518c5f1fab50215f766eef19802d.commitMessage: Refactored checking of operator token for participation in generic declaration into separate method.

f3fe388937df6497e4afe551c952cacb548337c8.commitMessage: Fix to ignore LT,GT,BAND,QUESTION tokens if part of generic declaration. Partially based on patch 1097339.

added check for 'instanceof'
refactored to a new variable
removed redundant IGNORE option
